pageContent: Purpose: To cure localized prostate cancer, the entire prostate must be eliminated, which is what all forms of treatment must achieve. Although there is no better way to cure localized disease than total surgical removal, the challenge is whether this can be accomplished with acceptable morbidity.

metaData.source:
Sexual rehabilitation after treatment for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8428325/
